Package com.iontrading.mkv

Interface GlobalEventListenerFactory

  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public interface GlobalEventListenerFactory
    Factory Interface for creating GlobalEventListener object
    example: How to create a custom GlobalEventListenerFactory and use it to receive global events 
     {
     @code
     public class MyCustomGlobalEventListner implements GlobalEventListner {
         // TODO implement interface methods
     }

     public class MyCustomGlobalEventFactory implements GlobalEventListenerFactory {

         public GlobalEventListener create(Mkv mkv) {
             return new MyCustomGlobalEventListner();
         }
     }
 }
    Sample code to add your custom GlobalEventListener factory to the qos object.
    This factory will be used by engine to create object at an appropriate time 
     {
     @code
     MkvQoS qos = new MkvQoS();
     qos.addGlobalEventListenerFactory(new MyCustomGlobalEventFactory());
     qos.setArgs(args);
     mkv = Mkv.start(qos);
 }
    Another example using adapter: 
     {
     @code
     public class GlobalEventListenerAdaptor implements GlobalEventListener {
         public void onStop() {}
 
         public void onPublish(MkvObject object, boolean start, boolean dwl) {}
 
         public void onUpdate(MkvRecord record, MkvSupply supply, boolean isSnapshot) {}
 
         public void onSupply(MkvChain chain, String record, int pos, MkvChainAction action) {}
 
         public void onUpdate(MkvMQSubscribeEvent event) {}
 
         public void onFunCall(MkvFunctionCallEvent evt, String remote) {}
 
         public void onResult(MkvFunctionCallEvent event, String remote, MkvSupply result) {}
 
         public void onError(MkvFunctionCallEvent event, String remote, byte errcode, String error) {}
 
         public void onCall(MkvTransactionCallEvent event, String remote) {}
 
         public void onResult(MkvTransactionCallEvent event, String remote, byte code, String message) {}
     }
 }
    If we are interested only in the publish, supply events, we can do as following: 
     {
     @code
     public class GlobalPublishSupplyListener extends GlobalEventListenerAdaptor {
         public void onPublish(MkvObject object, boolean start, boolean dwl) {
             System.out.println("Object :" + object.getName() + " is " + start ? "Published" : "Unpublished");
         }
 
         public void onUpdate(MkvRecord record, MkvSupply supply, boolean isSnapshot) {
             System.out.println("supply received for object " + record.getName());
         }
     }
 
     public class AnotherCustomGlobalEventFactory implements GlobalEventListenerFactory {

         public GlobalEventListener create(Mkv mkv) {
             return new GlobalPublishSupplyListener();
         }
     }
 
     MkvQoS qos = new MkvQoS();
     qos.addGlobalEventListenerFactory(new AnotherCustomGlobalEventFactory());
     qos.setArgs(args);
     mkv = Mkv.start(qos);
 }

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GlobalEventListener create​(Mkv mkv)
      Function to create a new GlobalEventListener object.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        GlobalEventListener create​(Mkv mkv)
        Function to create a new GlobalEventListener object.
        Parameters:
        mkv - the Mkv object representing the engine instance.
        Returns:
        returns the object representing the concrete implementation of GlobalEventListener interface
